name: Endeavor Strategies
description:
Entertainers as well as politicians are relying on a new frontier of public relations and communications. Messaging driven by data, stories told with expertly crafted digital content and media strategy deployed with metrics is where the art of communication meets the science of analytics to create lasting impact. At Endeavor Strategies we care about PR tactics that are measurable versus traditional —we want to prove that our work is moving the needle in the direction you need.
We don’t just boast PR experience; we demonstrate PR capability. Whether you’re looking to shape your public image as an entertainer or establish yourself as a thought leader in Washington around issues affecting your industry, we want to help you build not just image but influence as well.
READ MORE...
